website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular, inexpensive, and refillable chalk ball for various sports and activities.
pros: Nearly mess-free in storage sock, unlike loose chalk
cons: Many customers complained that the ball is difficult to refill with new chalk once used

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and no mess
customer_reviews.text: I put this chalk ball in one of those gallon-sized ziplock bags and leave it in my gym bag. Before my deadlift top sets I just open the ziplock bag and briefly rub my hands against the chalk ball. Takes a few seconds and I get a nice, clean coating of chalk. Zero mess.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny, no mess and works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My hands sweat really bad making dead lifts impossible. with the chalk I'm already lifting more weight with normal grip now than I was able to do before even with mixed grip. My gym doesn't allow chalk, and with this chalk there is very little mess, no one knows I use it at the gym. I have a small gym sack I carry around the gym, I keep the chalk ball in a gallon zip lock bag and there is no mess at all. all you need to do is squeeze the ball once with each hand and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Zryder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good chalk. I've bought it twice now because I recently lost my chalk bag and bought a new one at the gym. I bought a random chalk ball they had there cause there are all the same amirite? Used it for a few sessions and missed the feeling of this bag. I've had it now for a few trips and can honestly say I prefer the feel of this bag to others I have tried. I liked it enough to rewrite this review. Originally it was the first sentence.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Semprit

customer_reviews.title: I just need to roll it in my hands a couple of times to get a good coating. I keep it in a gallon freezer ...
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for use in a commercial gym. I just need to roll it in my hands a couple of times to get a good coating. I keep it in a gallon freezer bag inside my gym bag. Doesn't send a bunch of excess wasted chalk into the air. Will keep & refill when I run out of the chalk that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: ML Tross

customer_reviews.title: great chalk
customer_reviews.text: This was quite fantastic. It was definitely filled to the brim with chalk, and the chalk feels pretty good. I use it for rock climbing, and it doesn't go everywhere, and has a good amount of friction. It doesn't have an odd smell either, like some chalks have.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really good. I like the toggle as I can hang this from my rack to access during deadlifts, pullups and barbell rows . It distributes the chalk evenly and has lasted quite a long time even with fairly heavy use. Worth the money. I will buy another one when this one runs out Edit: I finally bought another one. The chalk ball lasts a long time in a garage gym where I am predominantly performing deadlifts, squats, bench and pullups/ring work.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.E

customer_reviews.title: First time using chalk, this seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail a couple of days ago, used it once. Super easy to use. Put it in a ziplock back in my gym back, easy enough to reach in the bag and chalk up without getting anything else chalky. Nice for gym etiquette. Like I said, first time using chalk for lifting, first time using any chalk, so nothing to compare it to. But I'm happy with it, the chalk seems good, the application method works, the prime delivery was good. Good product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Better company.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is my chalk bag a good quality, refillable, essential, chalk bag but it was also delivered with the kind of service you don't get with most companies. About 10 minutes after I got the shipping and delivery confirmation on my phone (and obviously the product at my door) I got an email from the company hoping that everything was in order and I was satisfied with my product. Jeff, the owner of 321 STRONG, made sure I was taken care of and had a stress free process of buying and receiving my chalk. It's great chalk. It's a great company. I'm sure to keep buying from 321 STRONG in the future.
customer_reviews.author: greenbaykj

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk “sock”
customer_reviews.text: This chalk “sock” works really well. The material is well made. When I started climbing 20 years ago, I used my wife’s panty, but this is far better at containing chalk and preventing over chalking, which for someone like me, naturally more sweaty on longer rope climbs or more challenging boulders. It fits nicely in my smaller sized chalk bag and is great for managing chalk. Jut reach into the chalk bag and squeeze, or take It out and pat, then return to the bag and go.
customer_reviews.author: DietJava

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Great Product. From a Company who Cares.
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 customer service. Once you buy the product, you receive a nicely written email from the company, and it seems like they really do care about you and having a good product overall. The product in itself is quite good too. It comes in a little plastic baggy, so unless your gyms cool with chalk everywhere, I’d advise getting a bigger bag to put the ball in, otherwise it’ll get everywhere. But the chalks good, it distributes nicely onto your hands and definitely will improve your grip a lot. Altogether an inexpensive, yet very helpful product, coming from a company that actually cares
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carr

customer_reviews.title: Kinda messy
customer_reviews.text: It works okay but gets chalk everywhere. We usually have chalk buckets at the gym with chalk blocks and I would grab a piece and chalk my hands without it getting all over. Since COVID we did away with the chalk buckets and have to bring our own. The chalk ball “puffs” chalk everywhere and I end up having to clean the floor after even if I try to be careful about it. Not something you want to have to worry about in the middle of a WOD.
customer_reviews.author: ZRex1102

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk, and packs well!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some chalk to use on my hands since I've been moving up in my deadlifts, and this option seemed like the best and most reasonably priced on Amazon. I like that it comes in a ziplocked bag so I can be sure (hopefully) that no chalk spills out into my gym bag. So far, the chalk gives me a solid grip and comes out of the sock easily with a squeeze. I will say it feels a bit flimsy, but I think that's to ensure the chalk comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Juhaxos

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Before this purchase, I never have bought chalk for lifting before. So I chose this seller since it had a good price and good feedback. I like that it is in the small pouch because it doesn't get messy and it's easy to carry around. All you have to do it squeeze on the pouch a little and you get a good amount of chalk for your lifts. It is refillable, so useful for long-term use. I bought it about 3 months ago and it has kept its quality. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JSanchez

customer_reviews.title: Use for climbing
customer_reviews.text: I love using this chalk for climbing outdoors and also at climbing gyms. I appreciate the fact that this product is zero mess, Non-toxic, unscented so that I don't bother those around me, and its also refillable! Its a little cotton sock so makes it super easy to put into another little bag and take it with me everywhere hassle free. **Includes re-closable bag for mess-free storage :) love that
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K

customer_reviews.title: Quality Unexpected
customer_reviews.text: For the price point of some higher-end chalk balls, I was disinclined to invest in them. When I received this ball, I expected something average, yet I was quite impressed. The stitching is strong and the fabric seems like it can take a beating. Granted, the chalk it comes filled with is not the highest quality, it is perfect for the beginner climber. When I have worn my new ball out, I will definitely come back to purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: OK, but prefer tackier chalk
customer_reviews.text: Pros: dries clammy/damp hands quickly, resealable package is handy to store it in so chalk doesn't get all over the inside of your gym bag. Cons: pretty basic - better than no chalk, not as sticky/tacky as I generally prefer. Basically about what I expected for the price point. Will continue to use and wouldn't go out of my way to replace but may pick up a tackier chalk if I come across one in a physical store that I can try before buying.
customer_reviews.author: MissHolly

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: Works great with not a lot of mess. Put it in a larger ziploc freezer bag to make it easier to access as I am using this in the gym and don't want to intentionally leave a huge mess behind. The seller has been great about reaching out to make sure the order was up to specs.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk bag for deadlifts and pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalk bag to help my grip with deadlifts, pull-ups and other pulling exercises and it has worked very well. It puts just the right amount of chalk on my hands without being too much. I have used loose chalk in the past and it ended up just being a mess so I like the lighter coating that this provides. Being refillable means I can keep using the bag when it runs out, but I have been using it for about 2 months now and I can't tell that the bag has gotten any smaller so I think it will be a while before it needs refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my five year old granddaughter whose hands were red and blistered from playground and gym climbing. She was absolutely delighted to get this, not so much to protect her hands as the enhanced status on the playground and at the gym. The chalk was so soft and the packaging protected any other objects in her area from receiving a dusting. I did notice that her hands were just fine after a particularly rough and tumble period on the monkey bar. I imagine this would be a terrific product for more professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Simpson

customer_reviews.title: It's chalk
customer_reviews.text: For people in sports for a better grip on their equipment. Trying it out tho for playing video games with sweaty hands. Not too bad but you better have something to collect everything that doesn't cling to your hands like a small trash can. My little brother thought I did a bunch of coke in his room hehehe.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lifting
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a garage gym. Really doesn’t work that well if you like really chunky lifting chalk. I recommend just storing that in a Tupperware. But this bag is great for the fine chalk. Doesn’t release too much, and upon reapplication of chalk during a workout, it doubles as a device to soak the sweat off your hands. I would absolutely recommend for anyone with flat paint on their equipment, someone who sweats a lot during a workout, and definitely if both apply to you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Chalk Bag is Good, Service is Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as described. I use it climbing in an indoor gym and it works great. No problems at all. The product itself is mundane and good. The 321 Strong service, on the other hand, is fantastic. I would definitely recommend the seller for any of your needs as Jeff is diligently focused to his customer satisfaction and providing a great product. Well done, Jeff.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Snow

customer_reviews.title: Light chalk application
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home lifting area. I originally liked the bag because it prevents overloading the chalk on my hands which helps keep my oly bar cleaner (and easier to clean when needed). All that is still true but it’s often too light of an application. Good product but I’ll likely buy a chalk block as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eli G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on and it’s stays on for a few sets. Not like cheaper quality chalk where it disappears after a set. Grips very well. I’ve had my bag for 6 months, use it often for Olympic lifts and kettlebell work and I have barely put a dent in the it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk, overall pretty clean
customer_reviews.text: I lift in a commercial gym that doesn't allow chalk. This is like bag is great! I just toss this bag into a Ziploc freezer bag and keep it in my gym bag. Give it a quick squeeze before deadlifts and good to go! Ample chalk, and I feel decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meem79

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The first bag lasted a few months
customer_reviews.text: I lift heavy most of the time, so with this product and a towel to dust off excess chalk, really makes the process simple and fast. A couple of thumps in the palm of my hand and ready to pull. Love it. The first bag lasted a few months, really depends on how much you need before you have to refill, but that process is easy as well. Just make sure that when you do refill, do it in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.author: Romann T.

customer_reviews.title: Can't refill
customer_reviews.text: It comes with chalk already, which is great. Unfortunately, it's a HUGE PAIN to refill. I ultimately just had to toss it because I couldn't fill it up with chalk. It's too bad because when it's actually filled with chalk, it's a great chalk bag.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This does as it intends. Product came on time and as described. Came in a zip lock bag so you don't have to use your own. Only drawback is the chalk distribution is not even and takes several pumps to get a decent amount of chalk on your hands. Other than that it's fine
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to loose chalk
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a chalk bag for climbing. Seems to work well, allows you to chalk up your hands without spilling all over the place. It's been probably over a year since I got it and it seems to last well with a medium level of use.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: average chalk
customer_reviews.text: We use this chalk for our climbing wall in our living room. We keep it in a grocery bag and it works well for keeping chalk going all over the house. I would not use it for real climbing because it takes a fair amount of work to get your hands coated in chalk. I prefer loose chalk that I can put my whole hand into. The chalk is pretty good, does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scholle

customer_reviews.title: Refill is a mess. Do it outside.
customer_reviews.text: About what you would expect. Came with ample chalk. Opening is tough, but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not worth it. I used this for climbing and I could've just put my loose chalk in my chalk bag without this tiny one inside. It's a bit hard to get chalk on your hands when inside this little bag
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-Use
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user of this product, I have to say that I am Extremely Satisfied :). It is really easy to use; it's like a bar of soap, just rub the Chalk ball wherever you want to have chalk. One thing to keep in mind is that the ball releases the right ammount of chalk and it doesn't Overdo it (it doesn't flood your hand with chalk). 1 bonus perk is that i no longer have to carry my bigO'bag of chalk with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great for all workout types
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for Crossfit and it works great especially since it is in a bag. It is easy to carry around and store so no big messes occur. It also was shipped and delivered extremely fast which I appreciated
customer_reviews.author: hwibben

customer_reviews.title: Those that looking for a great product for your accessory's for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Those that looking for a great product for your accessory's for the gym, cross-fit, whatever, this chalk ball does the trick for keeping your hands dry! Oh, and did I mention Its refillable? My product arrived early and then received an e-mail from the owner Jeff of 321 Strong asking if I was satisfied with my purchase. And of course I was because it came the day I needed the most, training heavy chest that day! Thanks for a great product! Victor Szczerbinin Toms River, NJ
customer_reviews.author: Waterswonder

customer_reviews.title: Good way to chalk up during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: Great product - it’s being used during gymnastics so my athlete doesn’t have to share the community chalk during COVID-19. Several other people in her gym have asked her where she got it and she has started a trend. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Fraley

customer_reviews.title: It's gym chalk and it works!
customer_reviews.text: It's gym chalk and it works! Just be sure to carry this in some type of plastic bag or a dedicated pouch/bag in order to prevent the chalk from getting all over everything else in your gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This prodcut does what it's supposed to and came quickly. Additionally, I loved the packaging it came in as there was zero mess. Just the right amount of chalk comes out from the entire "ball", and it's super easy to refill as well. If i need another one eve, I'll definitely be getting this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: the chalk ball is not very easy to refill
customer_reviews.text: I like the refillable feature. But it is not very easy to refill the chalk ball. In particular, it is not easy to open the ball wide enough to refill a lot of chalk at once.
customer_reviews.author: lalala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect application
customer_reviews.text: I used this for lifting and the application is perfect. Before I just used to use a block and either I would get too much and it would make a mess or too little and I’d lose my grip, but the bag allows me to get the right amount consistently. I put it in a big ziplock so it wouldn’t make a mess when I rub my hands on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia22

customer_reviews.title: Portable chalk  for lifting!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its portable and theres no mess! I take it with me to the gym and theres no residue left on the floor. It releases the right amount to get my hands ready for lifting. Even my coach asked me where i purchased my chalk from!!
customer_reviews.author: hart

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy and clean this is vs standard chalk. Certainly doesn't have the same coverage and grip as some other chalk products I used but just the right amount for what I need. Doesn't leave a chalk mess behind after use either.
customer_reviews.author: James J Canepa

customer_reviews.title: This Chalk Walks the Talk
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this a couple times a week at her home gym. I gave her a plastic jug with a lid to keep it waterproof and clean rather than buying a chalk bag. The jug works fine. The chalk ball has lasted for about 2 months so far. 2-3 times a week, about an hour at a time she's out there practicing. Decent price, good product, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GWP

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This item came exactly as described. We are already using it in our garage gym and it works out great. Yes, it does make a mess but that's what chalk does (especially if you leave it where your three year old can get it). Also, I have not had any issues with my product but I have received a personal email from the owner of the company guaranteeing his product. Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: tophermike

customer_reviews.title: Works surprising well
customer_reviews.text: I really like how well this chalk sticks to my hands. I was surprised how little actually came off on my Ohio bar with aggressive knurling. I keep the ball in a gallon size zip lock bag and just reach each hand in and squeeze the ball. No chalk dust mess.
customer_reviews.author: James W Van Fosson

customer_reviews.title: ... bag broke open in my chalk bag and is useless. The chalk is just alright
customer_reviews.text: The bag broke open in my chalk bag and is useless. The chalk is just alright.
customer_reviews.author: lajk218

customer_reviews.title: Great clean way to chalk up
customer_reviews.text: a nice way to chalk up in a climbing gym without making too much of a mess easy to refill too, though that part is a little messy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Just got this and i am loving having a decent ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and i am loving having a decent grip again especially when doing any pulling movements. Will buy again for sure. My barbell is very slick with not much knurling so this helps a ton.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good bag of chalk. It’s much better than using loose chalk and holds it in well. It’s sturdy enough to last long enough to be refillable. You just need to roll it in your hands a nit to coat them properly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: works. the chalk grippiness isn't as great as other chalk brands. this one leaves a weird feeling I'm not used to. works just fine
customer_reviews.author: phi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great grip
customer_reviews.text: Great little chalk bag. Exactly what I needed I was having an issue keeping a decent grip on various bars and dumbbells and this chalk works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son when he goes to the gym and he loves it. He's been wanting chalk and this works great for him. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. The only reason for the 4 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. The only reason for the 4 stars is the packaging, not the ship packaging, but the bag that the chalk ball resides in. It's a pain to take it out of the bag as it's too small. I end up losing too much chalk all over the place as it hits that bag going in and out. I workout in a fitness center versus a hardcore gym so I like try and avoid making too big of a mess. The product itself works well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Crossfitters!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Small footprint, but super effective. I can't stand not knowing if a gym I visit is going to have chalk or not and this solves my problems. The only thing I would say that has room for improvement is that the opening of the bag is a little small; putting the chalk ball back in the bag after use should be as easy as just dropping it back in. Instead I find myself stuffing it back in. But this doesn't have anything to do with the effectiveness of the product, so 5 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Noble

customer_reviews.title: go for it
customer_reviews.text: Used for my climbing chalk bag. It's bigger than I expected, about fist size. The cinch is slightly hard to work sometimes. I've had it for about 3 months using it 3 days a week and it's been holding up decent. I may prefer loose chalk over the chalk sock though cause I like my hands to be supa chalky cause mine are always sweaty.(this is just a preference)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool and gym use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He likes it. It’s pretty large for my hands but it seems to be a good product. Only had it for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tristy Rosier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chalk bag, comes with chalk!
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly and was amazing. It helped my grip and the seller really took his time to reach out to me and see if I had any questions. I didn't, since this is a simple item, but made the seller, 321 STRONG, a really great one in my mind. Chalk can easily be refilled in the bag and there's enough for quite a few workouts before you need to refill. Been using it two weeks now and haven't had to refill yet, though I only use it on deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: K. Romero

customer_reviews.title: It’s chalk !
customer_reviews.text: They work great for the price, I do hate the mess I leave but that’s the whole point of chalk . Ever since Covid has been going on my gym recommended we bring our on chalk and it works great and last pretty decently .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cantor

customer_reviews.title: Increase strength
customer_reviews.text: I always make sure to use chalk on heavy deadlifts and some pulling exercises. It makes gripping the bar with sweaty hands much easier. I think it is also safer to use chalk on these lifts. You can focus more on the appropriate muscle groups and not sacrifice form.
customer_reviews.author: musicperson

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use in gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: For our grand daughter who is 7 and excels at gymnastics. She loves the way the chalk powder works for her gymastics
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Lambis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product it helps me a lot of very sweaty hands but you waste a lot when you use it that’s my only problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected, very fine powder, great stick for powerlifting types. Love this little thing! I keep her in a zip lock bag and just roll my hands on it when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: campbellvt

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, I don’t have to open & close a bag of chalk every time I want to hit the heaviest deadlifts I can easily just slap it into my palms & get just the right amount of chalk for that perfect amount of grip, have had it for months & I still have plenty of chalk left, saves chalk very well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: miguel hernandez

customer_reviews.title: great to have
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome to have when you're needing chalk for your WODs and you don't want to use what everyone else is touching.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk ball(sock), ok chalk.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chalk ball, the material and the way it's reusable. The rope/cord that holds it closed is also great, The chalk inside I didn't adapt very well, I feel like my hands sweat to much for a thin chalk. But I definitely recommend for the fact of being a good quality material and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.text: A good chalk ball. It does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ringerud

customer_reviews.title: Great, as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to add this ball to my chalk bag and have an easily accessible source of chalk for indoor rock climbing. The ball came very full of chalk and was exactly what I expected. It's often hard to get as much chalk on my hands as I would like, but that's just the nature of a chalk ball. The chalk quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! At first it felt like i wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! At first it felt like i wasn't going to get enough chalk on my hands using this (my first time using chalk) but was i WRONG! this product is PERFECT! the sack dispenses just the right amount where you have enough to grip a bar, but not too much to where your wasting any chalk! LOVE IT! Only grip is I see chalk sprinkling out when I put it back in the sealable bag, but that is not a big deal because im sure it sticks back to it once it settles inside. Timely shipment, EXCELLENT customer care! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... didn't have to deal with loose chalk and it's WONDERFUL. I use it for rock climbing and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that I didn't have to deal with loose chalk and it's WONDERFUL. I use it for rock climbing and all I have to do is give this a squeeze and my hands are perfectly coated. Plus it doubles as an excellent stress ball. This is a great company too! They're the first amazon seller to ever contact me personally to make sure the item was as expected, and I can honestly say that their product and customer service exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McNamee

customer_reviews.title: I can grip a LOT better with chalk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. The price it right. I mainly use it for rock climbing on hang boards. Some of the holds that I could not get, I can get easily with chalk. I have only used one other brand of chalk and there is no noticeable difference between them. The chalk is messy and you can't get it on your hands without making a mess, but I guess that's just how chalk is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hands dry!!
customer_reviews.text: Playing golf, my hands get very wet during the summer months, but using the chalk ball keeps my grip on the golf club firm. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanice M

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a chalk cone!
customer_reviews.text: This ball of chalk is not a hard, solid ball. It is in a bag filled with the powder, making it lightweight and easy to use for any size hand. Our 10 yr old twin boys and our 6'5" friend find it easy to utilize throughout our matches. Great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds chalk, but too stingy...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chalk ball for climbing purposes, where a good coating of chalk is important. The bag is too thick to allow enough chalk to pass through, therefore more air passes through than actual chalk. This causes a very thin dust of chalk to coat your hands and you end up just getting a bunch of chalk dust in the air. I ended up having to open up the bag and pour some out to coat the outside of the ball, which completely defeats the purpose. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Does not cover my hands with as much chalk as a traditional chalk block but great for my back with the yoke or legs for a deadlift. I keep it with a traditional chalk block in a climbers bag for optimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Perham

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk ball for bouldering
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner at bouldering (mostly V2 and some V3), and this chalk works fantastically. The only downside is that the chalk is fine when it comes out of the bag, so you can only get a thin layer on your hands unless you squeeze the ball a bunch. It's fine for short bouldering routes, but for longer climbs heavier chalk would be better. Since chalk bags naturally give thinner layers, It's not worth knocking a star off. All in all, the chalk bag works great and the price is right, 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Prior

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this for deadlifts and such. The pouch is easy to use and the chalk does a terrific job of helping me maintain my grip. My only knock is the size of the resealable bag. It is barely bigger than the sock so it is difficult to.put back in w/out making a mess. I just went to a bigger resealable freezer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dlansford

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this chalk ball twice now climbing and I really enjoy it. I also enjoy that they sent me a personal thank you email. It's very personable and I will be back to purchase more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size, not too big
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and the last chalk bag I will buy. It's a nice size, not too big, not too small. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for chalk. I use it primary for powerlifting and it definitely gets the job done. Chalk sticks to my hands and to the bar very well. Only word of warning is you definitely will need to keep the plastic ziplock bag it comes in. I keep it in the bag and it stays in my car. If you don't keep it the bag or some other container you will chalk everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: kyle lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Solid sock
customer_reviews.text: Got this for two reasons. I needed a new chalk bag anyway, and I really like these with them, and the gym I've started climbing at requires some sort of chalk bag and no lose chalk. Works great. I put in my chalk bag for climbing and it is awesome. Doesn't make a mess and I can usually get a good amount of chalk pretty quicky. Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: She loves rock climbing and was beyond happy to get shoes and the chalk
customer_reviews.text: I bought my grand daughter climbing shoes and this chalk bag. She loves rock climbing and was beyond happy to get shoes and the chalk. She likes the way it hangs on her belt and it doesn't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Love the graphics and the variety. Definitely a five stars.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Give the chock bag a couple squeezes and your hands are coated with chalk evenly. The bag is great and the chalk is very smooth. Helps me get my lift on and I won't be power cleaning or snatching without it. Love this stuff. I recommend this product for those who love to power clean, snatch, and those who workout with kettlebells.
customer_reviews.author: Kawika

customer_reviews.title: My athletes enjoy the fact that they have some chaulk to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I am currently a pole vaulting coach in Northwest Arkansas and ordered this for my lady vaulters who have not currently developed their hand strength when gripping the pole during the vaults. The order came in exactly when I wanted it to, just before a meet. My athletes enjoy the fact that they have some chaulk to use now (under extreme circumstances; I want to have it as an accessory, not a must have), and I really like the quality of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described. The resealable bag it comes with isn't the best. I ended up just using a gallon ziploc bag instead
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk ball!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I both love that it's self-contained and ample enough that it should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: lfhandran

customer_reviews.title: Super Effective
customer_reviews.text: When Climbing I really enjoy using this chalk ball. It makes the bag feel full and easier to get chalk on the whole hand without needing to have the bag stuffed to the brim. Also, being refillable makes it so that I don't have to go out and replace it right away! I've only used it for a short time but so far has been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Shields

customer_reviews.title: Great for ring workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the rings my wife got me for my birthday. The kids and I love this and being lithe bag makes it a lot less messy.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so sweet. Instead of having to break out the old ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so sweet. Instead of having to break out the old Tupperware full of chalk, you just break this baby out of the bag and rub it all over your hands. So much better than loose chalk. It's great that you can refill it on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Yovani Perez

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not a pro climber, but I like being able to not contribute to the chalky haze at my gym. Overall it's seen about 2 months of use from me. Had it much longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Palms are Sweaty Knees Weak Arms are Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Hi I hope I caught your attention with this headline but this bag of chalk is just about as great as sliced bread. I use this chalk to help out with my deadlifts to reduce the friction of my sweaty palms and it's great! I would definitely recommend to other people who also deadlift and I would assume it's just as helpful for those who may do gymnastics and rock climbing. ***Disclaimer I wasn't given this product for free. I just really like it and wanted to share***
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter uses this for gymnastics practice, and really likes it. Small enough to carry around in her bag. We keep it in a large ziplock bag and no mess. Nice that it can be refilled.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the chalk being in the bag. I placed it right in my climbing bag and it's easy to grip and gets enough chalk on my hands. If I need more I just reach to the bottom of my bag and the chalk that has escaped has settled on the bottom of my chalk bag.
customer_reviews.author: heaven

customer_reviews.title: Messy and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is so popular. The chalk manages to leak out of the sock and make a mess when you use it but somehow doesn’t stick to your hands. I would almost tolerate the mess if it actually stayed on my hands too.
customer_reviews.author: jcamhi

customer_reviews.title: Friend loves this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend to use during rock climbing and he loves this! Says its durable and easy to apply chalk without making a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Yang

customer_reviews.title: I should’ve purchased this product a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this product for extra grip for heavy deadlift sets because I’m not a huge fan of lifting straps. Having the bag come pre-filled controls the mess and I’m no longer losing focus halfway up due to sweaty palms, 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: AStokes

customer_reviews.title: Good for Crossfit weight lifting too!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I got this for my girlfriend for Crossfit. We had gone rock climbing and she liked the convenience of a chalk bag. So she keeps it in her gym bag for when she lifts weights.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nave

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem very 'tacky'
customer_reviews.text: I dunno about this chalk. It kinda works. It isn't overly tacky or grippy. Almost powdery. I won't repurchase when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. I was immediately satisfied with it as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I was immediately satisfied with it as it is well made and incredibly convenient. I was most impressed with it during a deadlift workout. I used a lot of chalk and had virtually no mess. This bag has excellent chalk control. Also, the bag makes applying the chalk very easy - give it a squeeze or paint your hands with the bag. Also, the founder Jeff has provided 5-star customer service. He personally reached out to me to ensure my satisfaction. I plan on doing business with him in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Bolash

customer_reviews.title: Worth your dollars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Lots of chalk, great packaging! Would recommend - GREAT VALUE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Like that it came in a plastic bag but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Like that it came in a plastic bag but the bag isn't very durable. Bought for my daughter to use for gymnastics but she doesn't like it because it doesn't give her enough chalk. Instead of throwing it away I started using it for working out and it does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Garza

customer_reviews.title: Cha...... Chalk
customer_reviews.text: Works. Gets your hands nice and chalky. You won't need any wussy wrist straps here. That's right if you hit a Max with wrist straps that doesn't count as raw. And that won't count towards your max. Bro science in your face!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

product_meta.title: 321 STRONG Refillable Chalk Ball with 65 Gram (2.3 oz) Capacity, Comes Full - for Rock Climbing, Gym Workouts, Billiards, and More
feature_bullets: Includes non toxic , pigment free , fine powdered white gym chalk
Premium grade cotton sock with drawstring is less messy than loose chalk and great for rock climbing
Enhance your grip , keep your hands bone dry , and has no scent
Our lifting chalk increases friction dramatically
Comes in a recloseable zip top bag

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
